mapper.select: select er.* from event_record${tenantSuffix} er where er.id = #{id}

SELECT COALESCE(sum(CASE WHEN event_type = 'QUERY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) query_num, COALESCE (sum(CASE WHEN event_type = 'EXT_WRITE_ROWS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) insert_num, COALESCE (sum(CASE WHEN event_type = 'EXT_DELETE_ROWS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) delete_num, COALESCE (sum(CASE WHEN event_type = 'EXT_UPDATE_ROWS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) update_num FROM event_record${tenantSuffix}
